001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary.TimeEstimatesSummaries;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary.TimeEstimatesSummary;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment;
006import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment.ProjectType;
007import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Grade;
008import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
009import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
011
012import java.io.StringWriter;
013import java.util.Arrays;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.stream.Collectors;
017
018import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary.TimeEstimatesSummaries.formatProjectType;
019import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary.TimeEstimatesSummary.*;
020import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment.ProjectType.APP_CLASSES;
021import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment.ProjectType.TEXT_FILE;
022import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
023import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
024
025public class ProjectTimeEstimatesSummaryTest {
026
027  private void noteSubmission(Student student, Assignment project, Double... estimates) {
028    Grade grade = new Grade(project, Grade.NO_GRADE);
029    for (Double estimate : estimates) {
030      Grade.SubmissionInfo submission = new Grade.SubmissionInfo();
031      if (estimate != null) {
032        submission.setEstimatedHours(estimate);
033      }
034      grade.noteSubmission(submission);
035    }
036    student.setGrade(project, grade);
037  }
038
039  private Student addStudent(GradeBook book, String studentName) {
040    Student student = new Student(studentName);
041    book.addStudent(student);
042    return student;
043  }
044
045  private Assignment addProject(GradeBook book, ProjectType projectType) {
046    return addProject(book, "project", projectType);
047  }
048
049  private Assignment addProject(GradeBook book, String projectName, ProjectType projectType) {
050    Assignment project = new Assignment(projectName, 1.0)
051      .setProjectType(projectType);
052    book.addAssignment(project);
053    return project;
054  }
055
056  @Test
057  void oneSubmittedProjectHasSummaryWithOneSubmission() {
058    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
059
060    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
061
062    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student"), addProject(book, projectType), 10.0);
063
064    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
065    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
066    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
067    assertThat(estimates.getCount(), equalTo(1));
068  }
069
070  @Test
071  void maximumEstimateByStudentIsConsidered() {
072    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
073
074    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
075
076    double maximumEstimate = 11.0;
077    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student"), addProject(book, projectType), 10.0, maximumEstimate);
078
079    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
080    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
081    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
082    assertThat(estimates.getCount(), equalTo(1));
083    assertThat(estimates.getMaximum(), equalTo(maximumEstimate));
084
085  }
086
087  @Test
088  void maximumFromMultipleStudents() {
089    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
090
091    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
092
093    double maximumEstimate = 11.0;
094    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
095    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, 10.0, maximumEstimate);
096    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, 9.0);
097
098    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
099    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
100    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
101    assertThat(estimates.getCount(), equalTo(2));
102    assertThat(estimates.getMaximum(), equalTo(maximumEstimate));
103  }
104
105  @Test
106  void minimumFromMultipleStudents() {
107    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
108
109    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
110
111    double minimumEstimate = 9.0;
112    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
113    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, 10.0, 11.0);
114    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, minimumEstimate);
115
116    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
117    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
118    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
119    assertThat(estimates.getCount(), equalTo(2));
120    assertThat(estimates.getMinimum(), equalTo(minimumEstimate));
121  }
122
123  @Test
124  void medianFromMultipleStudents() {
125    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
126
127    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
128
129    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
130    double medianEstimate = 10.0;
131    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, medianEstimate);
132    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, 9.0);
133    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student3"), project, 11.0);
134
135    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
136    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
137    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
138    assertThat(estimates.getCount(), equalTo(3));
139    assertThat(estimates.getMedian(), equalTo(medianEstimate));
140  }
141
142  @Test
143  void medianOfOddNumberOfValuesIsMiddleValue() {
144    double median = 2.0;
145    Collection<Double> doubles = List.of(1.0, median, 3.0);
146    assertThat(median(doubles), equalTo(median));
147  }
148
149  @Test
150  void medianOfEvenNumberOfValuesIsAverageOfMiddleValues() {
151    Collection<Double> doubles = List.of(1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0);
152    assertThat(median(doubles), equalTo(2.5));
153  }
154
155  @Test
156  void medianSortsValues() {
157    double median = 2.0;
158    Collection<Double> doubles = List.of(median, 1.0, 3.0);
159    assertThat(median(doubles), equalTo(median));
160  }
161
162  @Test
163  void upperQuartileFromMultipleStudents() {
164    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
165
166    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
167
168    double upperQuartile = 4.0;
169    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
170    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, 1.0);
171    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, 2.0);
172    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student3"), project, 3.0);
173    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student4"), project, upperQuartile);
174    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student5"), project, 5.0);
175
176    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
177    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
178    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
179    assertThat(estimates.getUpperQuartile(), equalTo(upperQuartile));
180  }
181
182  @Test
183  void lowerQuartileFromMultipleStudents() {
184    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
185
186    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
187
188    double lowerQuartile = 2.0;
189    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
190    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, 1.0);
191    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, lowerQuartile);
192    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student3"), project, 3.0);
193    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student4"), project, 4.0);
194    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student5"), project, 5.0);
195
196    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
197    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
198    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
199    assertThat(estimates.getLowerQuartile(), equalTo(lowerQuartile));
200  }
201
202  @Test
203  void upperQuartileOfEvenNumberOfValues() {
204    double upperQuartile = 5.0;
205    List<Double> doubles = List.of(1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0, upperQuartile, 6.0);
206    assertThat(upperQuartile(doubles), equalTo(upperQuartile));
207  }
208
209  @Test
210  void lowerQuartileOfEvenNumberOfValues() {
211    double lowerQuartile = 2.0;
212    List<Double> doubles = List.of(1.0, lowerQuartile, 3.0, 4.0, 5.0, 6.0);
213    assertThat(lowerQuartile(doubles), equalTo(lowerQuartile));
214  }
215
216  @Test
217  void lowerQuartileOfOddNumberOfValues() {
218    double lowerQuartile = 2.0;
219    List<Double> doubles = List.of(1.0, lowerQuartile, 3.0, 4.0, 5.0);
220    assertThat(lowerQuartile(doubles), equalTo(lowerQuartile));
221  }
222
223  @Test
224  void upperQuartileOfOneValueIsThatValue() {
225    double value = 1.0;
226    assertThat(upperQuartile(List.of(value)), equalTo(value));
227  }
228
229  @Test
230  void upperQuartileOfTwoValuesIsSecondValue() {
231    double value = 2.0;
232    assertThat(upperQuartile(List.of(1.0, value)), equalTo(value));
233  }
234
235  @Test
236  void upperQuartileOfThreeValuesIsAverageOfSecondAndThirdValue() {
237    assertThat(upperQuartile(List.of(1.0, 2.0, 3.0)), equalTo(2.5));
238  }
239
240  @Test
241  void upperQuartileOfFourValuesIsAverageOfThirdAndFourthValues() {
242    assertThat(upperQuartile(List.of(1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0)), equalTo(3.5));
243  }
244
245  @Test
246  void averageFromMultipleStudents() {
247    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
248
249    ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
250
251    Assignment project = addProject(book, projectType);
252    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student1"), project, 1.0);
253    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student2"), project, 2.0);
254    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student4"), project, 4.0);
255    noteSubmission(addStudent(book, "student5"), project, 5.0);
256
257    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
258    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
259    TimeEstimatesSummary estimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(projectType);
260    assertThat(estimates.getAverage(), equalTo(3.0));
261  }
262
263  @Test
264  void generateMarkdown() {
265    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
266
267    Assignment appClasses = addProject(book, "AppClasses", APP_CLASSES);
268    Assignment textFile = addProject(book, "TextFile", TEXT_FILE);
269    
270    Student student1 = addStudent(book, "student1");
271    Student student2 = addStudent(book, "student2");
272    Student student3 = addStudent(book, "student3");
273    Student student4 = addStudent(book, "student4");
274    Student student5 = addStudent(book, "student5");
275    
276    noteSubmission(student1, appClasses, 4.0);    
277    noteSubmission(student2, appClasses, 5.0);    
278    noteSubmission(student3, appClasses, 3.0);    
279    noteSubmission(student4, appClasses, 6.0);    
280    noteSubmission(student5, appClasses, 2.0);    
281    noteSubmission(student1, textFile, 7.0);
282    noteSubmission(student2, textFile, 6.0);
283    noteSubmission(student3, textFile, 8.0);
284    noteSubmission(student4, textFile, 6.0);    
285    noteSubmission(student5, textFile, 7.0);
286
287    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
288    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
289    TimeEstimatesSummary appClassesEstimates = summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(appClasses.getProjectType());
290    assertThat(appClassesEstimates.getCount(), equalTo(5));
291
292    StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
293    summaries.generateMarkdown(sw, List.of(appClasses.getProjectType(), textFile.getProjectType()));
294    String markdown = sw.toString();
295
296//    System.out.println(markdown);
297
298    List<String> lines = markdown.lines().collect(Collectors.toList());
299
300    assertThat(lines.get(0), equalTo("|  | App Classes | Text File |"));
301    assertThat(lines.get(1), equalTo("| :--- | ---: | ---: |"));
302    assertThat(lines.get(2), equalTo("| Count | 5 | 5 |"));
303    assertThat(lines.get(3), matchesRegex("\\| Average \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
304    assertThat(lines.get(4), matchesRegex("\\| Maximum \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
305    assertThat(lines.get(5), matchesRegex("\\| Top 25% \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
306    assertThat(lines.get(6), matchesRegex("\\| Median \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
307    assertThat(lines.get(7), matchesRegex("\\| Bottom 25% \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
308    assertThat(lines.get(8), matchesRegex("\\| Minimum \\| \\d hours \\| \\d hours \\|"));
309  }
310
311  @Test
312  void okayToGenerateMarkdownWhenProjectsWithoutType() {
313    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
314    book.addAssignment(new Assignment("project1", 1.0));
315    book.addAssignment(new Assignment("project2", 1.0));
316    book.addAssignment(new Assignment("project3", 1.0));
317
318    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
319    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
320
321    StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
322    summaries.generateMarkdown(sw, List.of(APP_CLASSES, TEXT_FILE));
323    String markdown = sw.toString();
324
325    List<String> lines = markdown.lines().collect(Collectors.toList());
326
327    assertThat(lines.get(0), equalTo("|  | App Classes | Text File |"));
328    assertThat(lines.get(1), equalTo("| :--- | ---: | ---: |"));
329    assertThat(lines.get(2), equalTo("| Count | 0 | 0 |"));
330    assertThat(lines.get(3), equalTo("| Average | n/a | n/a |"));
331  }
332
333  @Test
334  void allProjectTypesAreFormatted() {
335    Arrays.stream(ProjectType.values()).forEach(projectType -> assertThat(formatProjectType(projectType), notNullValue()));
336  }
337
338  @Test
339  void submissionsWithoutEstimatesDoNotCount() {
340    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
341
342    Assignment appClasses = addProject(book, "AppClasses", APP_CLASSES);
343    Student student1 = addStudent(book, "student1");
344    noteSubmission(student1, appClasses, (Double) null);
345
346    ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary summary = new ProjectTimeEstimatesSummary();
347    TimeEstimatesSummaries summaries = summary.getTimeEstimateSummaries(book);
348    assertThat(summaries.getTimeEstimateSummary(APP_CLASSES), nullValue());
349  }
350}
